name: Mechanism (itch)
description:
Mechanism - horror-adventure game with stealth elements. Dive into the depressive steam-cyberpunk world that was infected with strange disease called Flegma.

Features: 

  • Complex stealth system based on a sound and robot's condition
  • A lot of exploring! Find every secret corner of a location to uderstand what happened with the world 
  • The story is driven by visual narrative 
  • Many puzzles
